ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by grants 92001005 and 92001006 from the Iranian Group for the Promotion of Science (IGPS). The authors are grateful to Ali Rezvani (former researcher, Iranian Research Institute of Plant Protection, Tehran) for identification of aphids, to Valiollah Mozaffarian (Research Institute of Forests and Rangelands, Tehran) and Marjan Diyanat (Department of Weed Science, Science and Research Branch of Islamic Azad University, Tehran) for identification of weeds and wild plants, and to Ahmadreza Golnaraghi (School of Chemical Engineering, University of Tehran) for image editing.
